about: I am an MCA graduate with 1.5 years of hands-on experience in full-stack web and mobile development, specializing in the MERN stack and React Native. My journey in software development has been driven by a deep passion for creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications. I enjoy solving complex problems and continuously learning new technologies to refine my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I strive to build seamless digital experiences that blend functionality with intuitive design. My adaptability and problem-solving mindset allow me to tackle challenges effectively, ensuring that every project I work on meets high standards of performance and usability. I am eager to contribute to innovative solutions, collaborate with like-minded professionals, and make a meaningful impact in the world of software development.
